title: Burg Brasserie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Informal Italian restaurant offering pizza, pasta, and a salad bar. You can get the salad bar as a large plate (around 18CHF), small plate (around 12CHF), or as a side plate with a main dish. Vegetarian choices are marked on the menu. The veggie burger is a sandwich made of tomatoes and mozzarella cheese--there is no burger. Non-smoking.
